author: julianfoad
msg: Tidy some merge code, particularly removing parameters that can easily be
(fix_deleted_subtree_ranges): Don't bother calculating and passing the
(find_gaps_in_merge_source_history): Remove a parameter in favour of
change and thus remove an unused parameter.
(do_file_merge): Only calculate the 'mergeinfo_path' in the block where
it's needed. Remove a redundant initialization.
(do_directory_merge): Don't calculate the 'mergeinfo_path' for passing to
populate_remaining_ranges(), only do so in the other place that needs it.

author: veithen
msg: Force usage of methods and constants in org.apache.neethi.Constants (instead of our own WS-Policy related constants) so that we may support WS-Policy 1.5.

author: hiranya
msg: Adding installation guide - Thanks Sadeep for the contribution

author: pamarcelot
msg: Fix for DIRSTUDIO-432 (Better error message for invalid LDIF records on import).
